content.raw:
When I tried to install it locally, I got:

~~~
$ sudo apt install libignition-common3-dev
Reading package lists... Done
Building dependency tree       
Reading state information... Done
libignition-common3-dev is already the newest version (3.0.0~pre5+hg20190221r09dbba64f335-1~bionic).
You might want to run 'apt --fix-broken install' to correct these.
The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libignition-common3-dev : Depends: libignition-common3-core-dev but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: libignition-common3-av-dev but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: libignition-common3-events-dev but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: libignition-common3-graphics-dev but it is not going to be installed
                           Depends: libignition-common3-profiler-dev but it is not going to be installed
E: Unmet dependencies. Try 'apt --fix-broken install' with no packages (or specify a solution).
~~~

Then after running with `--fix-broken` it worked. Not sure what this means though :slight_smile:
